LanguageData.MessageHateChantersAbsorbed: Tarikatçılar trans halinde, saldırıya uğradıklarında karşılık vermezler.
LanguageData.SelfResurrectText: {0_nameDef}, emir verilmesi halinde ölüm reddi ile kendini diriltebilir.
LanguageData.MessageUsingSelfResurrection: {0_nameDef} is using death refusal to self-resurrect.
LanguageData.MessageBiomutationLanceInvalidTargetRace: Cannot target: {0_nameDef} is not an animal or human.
LanguageData.MessageNoRoomWithMinimumContainmentStren: Warning: No rooms have the minimum containment strength for {0}. It will escape soon.
LanguageData.MessageTargetBelowMinimumContainmentStre: Warning: {0} is below minimum containment strength for {1}. It will escape soon.
LanguageData.MessageHolderReserved: Can't transfer to {0} reserved by someone else.
LanguageData.MessageOccupiedHoldingPlatformReinstalle: Warning: Reinstalling an occupied holding platform will release the entity. Transfer the entity to another platform first.
LanguageData.MessageOccupiedHoldingPlatformUninstalle: Warning: Uninstalling an occupied holding platform will release the entity. Transfer the entity to another platform first.
LanguageData.MessageOccupiedHoldingPlatformDeconstruc: Warning: Deconstructing an occupied holding platform will release the entity. Transfer the entity to another platform first.
LanguageData.MessageHostileDuplicate: A hostile duplicate of {0_nameDef} has appeared.
LanguageData.MessageProximityDetectorTriggered: A proximity detector has detected an invisible creature.
LanguageData.MessagePawnAttackedInDarkness: Something in the darkness has attacked {0_nameDef}.
LanguageData.MessageRevenantForcedVisibility: A hidden revenant has been revealed!
LanguageData.MessageCannotUseOnNonBleeder: {ABILITY_label} cannot be used on non-bleeding creatures.
